Text:
DriverPack Solution 13 build for DVD

Version: 13 R314 (01.03.2013)

Requirements: Any PC (desktop/laptop/netbook)
Windows 8 / 7 / Vista / XP (x32-x64)

Size: 4,4Gb

DriverPack Solution 13 - a DVD version of the most powerful manager for automated driver installation. 

Scans your computer hardware and offer to install/update the driver for all devices in Offline mode. Quickly, efficiently.

1 . Unpack with winrar
2 . Delete files in Programs
3 . Delete file : ToolsDrvUpdater

4. NOW copy to DVD / Flash

5. RUN
